p.s:
Download YouTube's video
install: >|| pear channel-discover openpear.org sudo pear install openpear/Wozozo_WWW_YouTube ||<
usage: >|| <?php require_once 'Wozozo/WWW/YouTube.php'; Wozozo_WWW_YouTube::download('gQf_QTsvXCU'); //YouTube's videoID Wozozo_WWW_YouTube::download('http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gQf_QTsvXCU'); // ||<
zf tool's provider >|| zf enable config.provider Wozozo_WWW_YouTube_Tool_YoutubeProvider ||<
